product_name: DIBS BeautyDesert Island Duo Blush + Bronzer Stick Mini
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackDIBS Beauty's Desert Island Duo Mini is your all-in-one stick - now mini! The custom-paired bronzer and blush transform your face in the flick of a wrist.
details: DetailsFeaturesPerfectly paired bronzer + blush in one easy duo miniOn-the-go and travel friendlyCreamy, buildable, blendable, streak-free applicationLayer and stack for endless possibilitiesFor usage on the face + lipsSafe for sensitive skinAllergy- and dermatologist-testedKey IngredientsMango Seed Butter: Softens and moisturizes dry skinJojoba Oil: Rich in Vitamin E, it softens and smoothsHyaluronic Acid: Known to reduce wrinkles and fine lines by boosting elasticity and moistureAntioxidant Blend: Sunflower seed, rosemary, and castor oil to enhance texture and brighten skin toneVanillin: Signature scentFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesGlutenItem 2636531How To UseSwipe the bronzer on your forehead, nose, cheekbones, and jawline for warmth and dimension. Add blush to apples of cheeks and anywhere else you want a pop of color. Apply directly from the stick or tap Duo Brush Face to stick, blend with the Duo Brush Face or your fingertips. Start with your base primer or foundation, then layer the duo, and finish with a setting powder or baked blush/bronzer.IngredientsBlush: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Mica, Octyldodecanol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Isostearyl Isostearate, Synthetic Wax, Kaolin, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Silica, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Vanillin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Dimethicone, Tocopherol, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 6 (CI 15850), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 22 Lake (CI 45380), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090).Bronzer: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Mica, Octyldodecanol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Synthetic Wax, Isostearyl Isostearate, Kaolin, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Silica, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Vanillin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Dimethicone, Tocopherol, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 6 (CI 15850), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Swipe the bronzer on your forehead, nose, cheekbones, and jawline for warmth and dimension. Add blush to apples of cheeks and anywhere else you want a pop of color. Apply directly from the stick or tap Duo Brush Face to stick, blend with the Duo Brush Face or your fingertips. Start with your base primer or foundation, then layer the duo, and finish with a setting powder or baked blush/bronzer.

reviews.headline: Good for first make up
reviews.comments: I wanted a blush and bronzer and this was good because i can tri them out i like the bronzer a lot and the blush is ok

reviews.headline: A little more please!
reviews.comments: I loved using this for the summer and on my cruise! I only wished it had a little bit more product. Obviously travel products are small but the packaging made me believe I had more to use. Overall would buy this again for travel!

reviews.headline: It's a no for me
reviews.comments: I feek as though it wipes away as soon as you start to blend it in. Broke me out too.

reviews.headline: But a full size of a different shade!
reviews.comments: I love the bronzer shade in this soooo much!  I have fair skin and this blends nicely, naturally!  The blush is a gorgeous shade too!  I bought this because I just wanted to try out the formula BUT then went back and bought the full size in shade 1 1/2 which the blush in that one is amazing!!!  I will definitely buy this in full size when I finish because the bronzer is so beautiful on fair skin!  Now I want more colors haha too bad there's no customization haha

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: blended in so nicely and the blush smells sooo good

reviews.headline: Dibs Duo stick is amazing!!!
reviews.comments: I love this product. So happy they made this in a mini travel size.  It's amazing

reviews.headline: Go big or go home
reviews.comments: There is less than an inch of product on each side, I undertsnad it's a sample but other samples ive had quite a bit more product. I will say its very creamy and ilk atilk test out the quality of the product but definitely lacking in size.

reviews.headline: going to try the mauve shade too
reviews.comments: I absolutely love Shade 2 in the Duo so this was perfect to get for a travel version when I forget to pack the bigger stick. The mauve color is really pretty so I love that I can try it out since I'm more used to a pink blush.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Glides on easily, great travel size, love it!

reviews.headline: perfect mini for a full look
reviews.comments: It's so convenient with the two colors. I've already gone through my first one but I've been using it for a few weeks now. Definitely going to get the full size one for my bathroom and more minis for my car and purse.

reviews.headline: Will be back for more!!!
reviews.comments: I bought this on a whim going to tje checkout. 10/10 will be back to try more colors!!!

reviews.headline: Cute and convenient
reviews.comments: I love this little stick because of the two colors and how creamy they are!

reviews.headline: Great Mini!
reviews.comments: I got this on #2. The colors are warm for both the blush and bronzer but not orange like #1. This mini is great for trying out the formula. Also great for traveling.

reviews.headline: Really cute and convenient!
reviews.comments: I picked this up in the check out line and really love it. There's nothing else quite like it. Great texture and fun way to try our the combination.

reviews.headline: Meh?
reviews.comments: I got shade 2 and it is extremely warm. The blush is pretty, but the bronzer basically pulls orange. It's also not that easy to blend. Definitely a return.

reviews.headline: Glad I tried it …
reviews.comments: Wanted something small for an on the go makeup bag. It smells really strongly of vanilla/sugar sweet which I am not a fan of but the smell doesnt last more than a few minutes. It blends reallt nicely with a puff or a brush. This is on me for not reading descriptions - I knew this was a mini but I wasnt expecting so little product. each side only goes up like a centimeter lol. overall i like it but will look for another blush/bronze duo or minis when this is used up.

reviews.headline: I would by this product every time
reviews.comments: My wife loves it . I always buy it for her

faceoff_positive.comments: I love the bronzer shade in this soooo much!  I have fair skin and this blends nicely, naturally!  The blush is a gorgeous shade too!  I bought this because I just wanted to try out the formula BUT then went back and bought the full size in shade 1 1/2 which the blush in that one is amazing!!!  I will definitely buy this in full size when I finish because the bronzer is so beautiful on fair skin!  Now I want more colors haha too bad there's no customization haha
faceoff_positive.headline: But a full size of a different shade!

faceoff_negative.comments: Wanted something small for an on the go makeup bag. It smells really strongly of vanilla/sugar sweet which I am not a fan of but the smell doesnt last more than a few minutes. It blends reallt nicely with a puff or a brush. This is on me for not reading descriptions - I knew this was a mini but I wasnt expecting so little product. each side only goes up like a centimeter lol. overall i like it but will look for another blush/bronze duo or minis when this is used up.
faceoff_negative.headline: Glad I tried it …

rollup.name: Desert Island Duo Blush + Bronzer Stick Mini
